thread.section_title: Evergreen.ie Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Evergreen.ie | www.evergreen.ie
thread.title: K. Menon

author: K. Menon
title: K. Menon
text: Go into the store whenever I'm in Galway, but first time I've used their delivery service. It took a few days to get here as it goes on a cargo ferry, but every step of communication was excellent. From helping me order things I'd seen in the shop that I couldn't find online to being notified of my delivery status. Will order regularly. It's so nice to have access to items that are otherwise extremely hard to source!
